about_the_game:
Welcome to JDM: Rise of the Scorpion. Explore mountain roads of the charming Guntama countryside and take part in various racing events. Show off your skill and become the best hashiriya in the area.



  • Experience the story prequel to JDM
Discover the story of Hatori ‘Scorpion’ Hasashi - an offspring of a traditional Japanese family, who strives to become the best racer in the area. Strict parents and high school expectations won’t stop him from becoming a part of the drifting revolution!

The story in JDM: Rise of the Scorpion is a unique prelude to the events that will take place in the full release of JDM.



  • Discover new areas
Kilometers of open-world roads alongside scenic vistas will let you test your skills as a driver. See how the environment changes with traffic, day and night cycles, and a dynamic weather system. Race like there is no tomorrow on challenging tight mountain paths, small city alleys, or beautiful lake-view roads, and drive through all of the other vibrant landscapes of the Japanese countryside.



  • Race with fully licensed cars
Find out how Hatori grows to become the king of drift while sitting behind the wheel of his Nissan 350z. Visit the Driving School to learn the basics of racing and drifting in various fine-tuned cars or take other Subaru, Mazda, or Nissan cars for a test drive from the local car dealer.



  • Feel the thrill of competition in racing events
Plot-driven events await, such as a race against Scorpion's enemy - Satoru, a clash for a date with Aoi, or a drifting duel against his confident friend, Ayumi. Stand up to compete with the best and show that becoming a legend leads through determination, passion, and relentless driving.

World of JDM

The story of JDM: Japanese Drift Master takes place in a fictional Japanese prefecture, Guntama. This area is inspired by the mountainous region of Honshu.

The free-to-play prologue JDM: Rise of the Scorpion is only an introduction to the story that will continue in the full version of the game. Characters portrayed in this unique introduction will return in JDM: Japanese Drift Master.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7400 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc A580 or GeForce GTX1660 or Radeon RX580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 10400f or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc A770 or GeForce RTX3060Ti or AMD Radeon RX6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Experience the automotive culture of Japan with a free prologue to Japanese Drift Master. Learn about the story of the rebellious high schooler Hatori and race through the winding roads at Haikama Lake. Discover the places where drift was born!
